page.title: 04VILLAGE FARM
page.content: The owner of this farm is Mr. Glover. The farm contains 85 acres of land,12 acres of which is used for arable,the rest for grazing. The crops he grows are potatoes and grass. He keeps 80 Fresian cows for milking. He also has 4 dogs,5 puppies,a ferret,3 cats and a rabbit. He grows about 80% of the cattle food,the rest he buys. Some of the calves are for market,the rest he keeps for milking. He has a sheep dog which helps with the cattle. He has six tractors,a plough,no combine harvesters,a barn to hold 1000 tons of silage. He sells his potatoes to a chip sho in Ansley. He has people to help tend the ground.
